
# EasyPhenology  
EasyPhenology is a software package for calculing phenological transition dates. It has
numpy at itâ€™s core, making model building and prediction extremely fast. The
core code was written to obtain the phenological transition dates for eddy covariance data using Gross primary productivity.
EasyPhenology is currently used in a DFG funded project PhenoFeedBacks
